Text:
Here's a challenge for yah..put up something 10 people haven't already put up!

You gonna go correct your mistake on Stag Night, or simply have hundreds download a movie they don't want?

By taking somebody else's mistake, and not looking at it, and posting it as yours how does this not become YOUR mistake? This is what 100s of you link monkeys do! So eager to get a skull and advertise YOUR TORRENT SITE you'll upload anything without even looking at it! Now literally hundreds of people are wasting their time uploading a movie they don't want.
